title: The Yoga Murder
description:
Two are attacked in a Lululemon store: One is tortured and beaten to death; her co-worker is found bloody, tied up and traumatized. The manhunt for two masked men would send shock waves through the affluent community of Bethesda, Maryland and expose an evil killer hiding inside the yoga community. 

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
